price: 30 Mais vous ne le voudrez que si Allah Lui-même, Omniscient et infiniment Sage, le veut.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
